hero.desc: Jabobo is an intelligent companion robot designed specifically for children aged 3-12. Integrating emotional computing, voice interaction and educational content, it provides children with a safe, fun and growth-oriented AI partner while protecting privacy.
hero.cert1: Certified by National Children's Product Safety
hero.cert2: End-to-end encryption, data never leaves the device

features.title: Why do parents choose Jabobo?
features.desc: We focus on combining child developmental psychology with AI technology to create an intelligent partner that truly understands children.

item1.title: Emotional Companionship
item1.desc: Recognizes children's emotions, actively comforts and encourages them, and builds a secure attachment relationship.

item2.title: Growth Content
item2.desc: Built-in graded stories, nursery rhymes, and popular science knowledge, all content reviewed by education experts.

item3.title: Privacy First
item3.desc: All voice data is processed locally, not uploaded to the cloud, fully controlled by parents.

trust.title: Accompanying over 50,000 families
trust.desc: "Jabobo is not just a toy, but a friend to children. He has learned to share and is more willing to express his emotions." - Ms. Li, Beijing, mother of an 8-year-old boy

footer.copyright: © 2026 Jabobo Technology (Beijing) Co., Ltd. All rights reserved.
footer.privacyNote: This product is only for family use and does not collect children's biometric features for commercial purposes.
